author: billbarker
msg: Update to document fixes to handling of invalid web.xml files and disabling JSP support.

author: billbarker
msg: Improve the handling of invalid web.xml files.
With this fix, the web.xml parsing of an invalid file always generates the same error every time Tomcat is started.

author: billbarker
msg: Rationalize the setting of the default mapping for JSP pages.
With this code move, only JspInterceptor knows anything about JSP pages.  In particular, removing JspInterceptor from server.xml disables all support for *.jsp files.
